name: Running off the Rails
description:
What could be more out of control than a runaway train? Place tracks in front of the train to stop it running off the rails.

This game features multiple speed settings. Here's a little guide if you're not sure what to pick:

  • Slow: Pick this option if you like to have time to think.
  • Normal: The recommended experience for this game. A balance of thinking and reflexes.
  • Fast: Pick this option if you want to test your reflexes. If you're struggling on this speed, try lowering the speed to practice the level.

There are 10 levels in the game. Can you clear them all?

Controls

The entire game is controlled using the [ARROW KEYS]. The [RETURN KEY] can be used to pause the game, if needed.

In the menu: Select an option with left and right. Use down to confirm, and up to cancel.

In the game: Use the arrow keys to move the cursor and place pieces of track. The arrows around the cursor show the directions it can move in.
